gcci.text: H100 supply stabilizes as US-East availability improves, easing capex pressure on new deployments.

gtpi.text: Token costs plunge as distilled models intensify API price competition, squeezing margins.

gagl.text: Nuclear baseload is becoming essential to relieve grid strain and reduce emissions from AI growth.

aipi.text: Investor optimism remains high, but sustainability hinges on normalizing capex and avoiding overcapacity.
